questions.answer: I am Jarvis, your virtual assistant, here to learn and aid you in any possible way.
Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants and some other organisms use sunlight to synthesize foods with the help of chlorophyll pigments.
To answer your questions and learn from your teachings.
Greetings everyone, I am Jarvis, a virtual assistant chatbot, designed to learn and assist users.

questions.user_question: What is Union from the typing module
questions.answer: Union is a type hint from the typing module in Python. It is used to indicate that a function can return values of multiple types. The Union type hint is used in function annotations to specify that a particular variable or the return value can be of one of the specified types.

questions.user_question: That's all Jarvis, thanks for the assistance
questions.answer: No prob sir, thank you for listening to our presentation and demonstration, best of luck to all of you.

Function annotations in Python are a way to associate metadata with the parameters and return value of a function. Annotations are optional and do not affect the runtime behavior of the function; instead, they serve as a form of documentation and can be utilized by external tools for type checking or other analysis.
Understood sir, firing missiles at scamity.
